name: Meebles
description:
Meebles - 2006

Our first complete(?) game we've made, that we still have a copy of at least. Take yourself back to when we were 13 and didn't know how to make a platform engine and MIDI was the standard for music.

Controls:

  • Left / Right Arrow - Move
  • Up Arrow - Jump
  • Shift - Menu Selection
  • Mouse - For some reason used on the level select screen
